compliant.section: 華碩電腦股份有限公司及其關係企業(下稱「我們」或「華碩」) 尊重並承諾保護您的個人隱私，我們致力遵循關於保護您個人隱私及個人資料安全之相關法令要求。
compliant.legal provisions: Data controllers must have a legal basis for processing personal data and be able to demonstrate compliance.  This section indicates ASUS's commitment to complying with data protection laws, aligning with the principles of lawfulness, fairness, and transparency.

compliant.section: 華碩隱私權保護政策及我們針對部份華碩產品及服務所制定的個人資料相關聲明(下稱「本政策」)將幫助您了解我們如何蒐集、使用及保護我們透過華碩產品及服務自您所取得的個人資料，我們亦將說明我們如何揭露、傳輸您的個人資料及其對象。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to be informed about the processing of their personal data in a concise, transparent, intelligible, and easily accessible form. This section highlights ASUS's provision of a privacy policy to inform users about data collection, use, disclosure, and transfer, aligning with the principles of transparency and information provision.

compliant.section: 華碩會在取得您的同意後，才會蒐集您的以下個人資料
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous.  A clear affirmative action signifying agreement to the processing of personal data is required.

compliant.section: 當您欲註冊ASUS會員時，您需要提供您真實、正確、最新且完整的註冊資料
compliant.legal provisions: Accuracy: Personal data shall be accurate and, where necessary, kept up to date; every reasonable step must be taken to ensure that personal data that are inaccurate, having regard to the purposes for which they are processed, are erased or rectified without delay.

compliant.section: 當您登入「ASUS會員中心」（進入「ASUS會員中心」的路徑：http://www.asus.com →請點選網頁右上角的「登入」→請輸入您ASUS會員的帳號/密碼→ 進入「ASUS會員中心」）時，您可自由選擇在「個人設定」中提供其他個人資料（如大頭照、性別、地址、職業）；亦可在體驗ASUS會員相關服務（如：「產品註冊」、「my Forum(論壇服務)」）時，自由選擇提供與該服務有關的個人資料（如：提供產品序號以完成產品註冊、在我們的論壇發布或上傳包含您個人資料的文章及圖片）。
compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject; Conditions for consent

compliant.section: 當您向我們購買華碩產品(如：在ASUS Store購買華碩產品)、部份付費服務時，您可能需要提供您的姓名、郵寄地址(包含郵遞區號)、電話號碼、電子郵件地址、信用卡號碼或其他付款資訊。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: 當您使用我們有關健康與運動紀錄的部份產品及服務時，您可能需要提供您的年齡、性別、身高、體重、其它身體質量數據如體溫、脈搏、血壓、心跳、腹部起伏及每日活動狀況如行走步數、睡眠狀況、卡路里消耗量、日誌資料等。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data is permissible with explicit consent.

compliant.section: 當您透過各種方式聯繫華碩，例如撥打電話至華碩(如：華碩客戶服務專線)、使用華碩線上真人客服服務、至華碩官方網站填寫聯絡表單、寄送電子郵件至華碩時，我們將可能把我們與您的通話內容進行錄音，或留存我們與您的對話紀錄或往返的電子郵件。
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing is lawful if necessary for the performance of a contract or for the purposes of legitimate interests pursued by the controller.

compliant.section: 當您選擇與和您健康有關的第三方，例如您的家人、照護者、醫療服務人員等共用以上數據資料時，我們將協助您管理與以上數據資料相關的存取與修改權限。
compliant.article numbers: Article 15: Right of access, Article 20: Right to data portability
compliant.legal provisions: Individuals have the right to access and control their health data, including sharing it with chosen parties.

compliant.section: 匿名資料為無法直接或間接識別您個人身分的資料，例如：您的產品型號、軟體的版本、發票日期等。
compliant.legal provisions: Data that has been anonymized in a way that individuals are no longer identifiable is not considered personal data.

compliant.section: 當您使用華碩產品和服務時，我們可能會因為各種可能的目的來透過華碩產品和服務蒐集以下的匿名資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Data collection must be limited to specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes.

compliant.section: 當您使用華碩產品及服務時，我們可能會蒐集與您的產品及服務相關連的記錄資料，例如您的產品型號、名稱、品牌、製造商、料號、產品的硬體（如CPU、主機版）與作業系統的類型與版本、產品的出廠設定值、啟用時間、韌體的更新方式與結果與更新日期、記憶體與儲存空間的大小、唯讀型記憶體（ROM）的相關資料(如ROM的類型、版本、浮水印、描述)、產品的相機解析度、產品機身顏色、使用之電信業者、連網狀態、通話狀態、待機狀態、當機事件、慣用介面、瀏覽器的類型、版本與語言、診斷與流量數據、使用習慣、產品的GPS與WiFi版本、系統狀態（如電池、CPU、RAM的使用狀況）、網路速度、硬碟容量使用率、散熱模組狀態、當地時間等。
compliant.legal provisions: Data Minimisation, Legitimate Interests

compliant.section: 當您使用華碩產品及服務時，我們可能會蒐集應用程式在您的產品及服務所產生的資料及您對應用程式的使用行為與互動方式，例如應用程式與軟體的名稱與版本、您安裝與卸載的時間、您登入與登出的次數與時間、使用頻率與次數、您開啟與關閉的次數與時間、您偏好之應用程式與軟體類型、使用習慣設定、應用程式與軟體的更新版本與結果等。
compliant.legal provisions: Data Minimisation, Legitimate Interests

compliant.section:
3.3 服務提供商
我們也會在本政策所提及之目的範圍內，將您的個人資料的必要項目揭露、分享給我們的服務提供商，以利其提供服務給您，例如協助我們發送行銷資料及舉辦行銷活動的行銷活動公司、運送您所購買或維修的產品的貨運公司、處理付款事宜的金流處理商，以及提供您客服支援服務(像是華碩電話客服、華碩線上真人客服、華碩產品的維修服務等) 的客務服務提供商。該等服務提供商皆將依循我們的指示於本政策所提及之目的範圍內使用自您的個人資料，我們亦會確保其等確實遵守本政策。
compliant.legal provisions: Data Processing Agreement with processor, instructions to processor

compliant.section:
3.4 基於法律或保護之目的
如有以下任何一種為遵循法律要求或為保全目的的情形時，我們將揭露、分享您的個人資料的必要項目予第三方:
於有遵守法令、主管機關或司法單位之要求、或為保全法律上的請求、抗辯或為防止詐騙或調查其他不法行為所必要時。
compliant.legal provisions: Legal obligation, legitimate interests (compliance, fraud prevention)

compliant.section: 上述跨境傳輸、儲存及處理利用行為皆將遵循本政策及各國個人隱私及個人資料安全之相關法令要求。
compliant.legal provisions: GDPR Article 44: General principle for transfers; GDPR Article 45: Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision; GDPR Article 46: Transfers subject to appropriate safeguards

compliant.section:
5.Cookies及類似技術
此段介紹華碩和第三方合作夥伴使用Cookies和其他類似技術的方式，以及說明您可如何管理Cookies的設定。
我們和第三方合作夥伴使用Cookies(此為儲存於您使用之產品上用於紀錄資訊的小型文本檔案)及其它類似技術，例如Web Beacons(網路信標)，來提供華碩產品和服務。如果您造訪華碩網域的其中一個網站(含子頁面和特定國家/地區的版本)，該網站可能設定以下部份或全部的Cookies及類似技術。
絕大部分的Cookies紀錄都僅儲存在您的產品上，而不會回傳至華碩。只有在少部分的情況下，Cookies紀錄可能會回傳至華碩，例如當您在ASUS Store購買華碩產品時，華碩為了驗證登入ASUS Store的使用者和下訂單者為同一人，以防止網站詐騙行為的發生，我們可能會透過Cookies將您在登入ASUS Store和下訂單時的IP位址分享給華碩。
compliant.legal provisions: GDPR Article 5(3): Storage limitation; GDPR Article 12(1): Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject; GDPR Article 13(1-2): Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: (1)為了滿足您使用華碩產品及服務時的線上瀏覽體驗，我們使用以下Cookies，以提供您使用華碩產品及服務所必備的功能：
compliant.legal provisions: GDPR Article 6(1)(f): Processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party

compliant.section: 儲存您的偏好設定 本類型的Cookies可將您的偏好設定儲存於您的產品中，例如您習慣使用的語言類別、國別或字體;在您再次造訪華碩產品及服務時，您即無需再次選擇國別、語言類別或字體，例如ASUS的current_site cookie、EntryPage cookie等。
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with GDPR's requirement for consent as a legal basis for processing personal data. Storing language, country, or font preferences can be considered as processing data to improve user experience, which falls under legitimate interest.

compliant.section: 維持網站流量的穩定性 本類型的Cookies可穩定華碩的網站瀏覽流量，讓您能順暢地瀏覽華碩的網站，例如ASUS的BIGipServerNew cookie。
compliant.legal provisions: Using cookies to ensure website stability and smooth browsing experience can be justified under legitimate interest, as it is crucial for website functionality and user experience.

compliant.section:
5.2 如何管理Cookies設定
請注意，您可透過瀏覽器，依自己的偏好管理您對於Cookies的設定。您可自由地將全部或部分（如第三方的Cookies）的Cookies設定為拒絕使用、刪除您瀏覽器內的Cookies紀錄或進行其他相關設定。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object, Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject

compliant.section: 在某些國家，當您第一次瀏覽華碩的網站時，我們會將簡短的Cookies說明文字放在這些網站的最上方橫幅中。您可在該橫幅中，自由選擇開啟或拒絕使用上述第三方的Cookies。
compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent, Definitions

compliant.section: 7.2 您亦應隨時更新您的防毒軟體及使用病毒或間諜掃描程式以確保您個人資料的安全。
compliant.legal provisions: Data integrity and confidentiality, Security of processing

compliant.section:
8.1 ASUS會員帳號：
請提供您真實、正確、最新且完整的ASUS會員資料，以讓華碩提供您相對應的產品及服務。
您亦可隨時進入「ASUS會員中心」更新、修改、查閱您的ASUS會員資料。
如您欲訂閱或取消訂閱電子報，您可隨時至「ASUS會員中心」進行設定。若您選擇取消訂閱電子報，請留意此設定約需要2個工作天完成。
compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Right of access, Right to rectification, Right to data portability

compliant.section:
8.2 華碩產品及服務：
有一些我們的產品及服務的介面上有支援開啟或關閉傳送您個人資料的功能(如：開啟/關閉傳送您的IP位址、您的產品的GPS)。當您使用這些產品及服務時，您可自由選擇是否願意分享或停止傳送以上個人資料給我們。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object

compliant.section: com向我們提出更新、存取、刪除、查閱、下載、拒絕我們使用您部份或全部的個人資料(例如：您認為我們可能不當地蒐集或使用您的資料)、限制我們使用您個人資料的用途(例如：不希望我們將您的個人資料作為分析使用)等需求。
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access, rectification, erasure ('right to be forgotten'), restriction of processing, data portability, and objection

compliant.section:
11.本政策的變更
我們將不定期修改本政策，因此我們建議您應時常瀏覽本政策。如您於本政策修改後仍繼續使用華碩產品或服務，我們將視為您同意我們修改後之本政策；當本政策有重大變更時，我們將於本服務網頁上公告或以寄送電子通知信的方式告知。您可查閱本政策頁面最下方以確認本政策之最後更新時間。
compliant.legal provisions: Requirement to provide information in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language.

non_compliant.section: 若您為未成年人，您應於您的父母親(或監護人)閱讀並了解本政策後方得使用本服務。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Processing of children's data requires specific consent requirements. GDPR sets the age of consent at 16, but member states can lower it to 13. This section doesn't specify the age of consent or detail how parental consent is obtained, potentially violating GDPR requirements.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the age of consent based on applicable regulations and detail the process of obtaining verifiable parental consent for children below the age of consent. This could include obtaining parental consent through a separate form, age verification mechanisms, or other appropriate methods.

non_compliant.section: 若您使用本服務、您或您的父母親(或監護人)同意將您的個人資料提供予我們，皆將被視為您或您的父母親(或監護人)同意本政策。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous.  This section doesn't clearly differentiate between consent for different processing activities and might not meet the 'unambiguous' requirement.
non_compliant.amend: Provide separate and specific consent requests for different processing activities (e.g., marketing, profiling). Ensure consent is obtained through a clear affirmative action, such as ticking a box or clicking an 'I agree' button. Avoid pre-ticked boxes or bundling consent with other terms and conditions.

non_compliant.section:
此段介紹華碩透過我們的產品及服務，蒐集了您的哪些資料，以及我們將如何使用您的資料。
當您使用華碩產品及服務（如：華碩的電腦、軟體、官方網站、客戶支援服務等）時，我們可能會蒐集您因為使用華碩產品及服務而提供給華碩的個人資料。以下為整體而言，華碩透過各式各樣的產品及服務，所可能蒐集的個人資料項目以及蒐集個人資料原因的彙整說明。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to be informed about the specific purposes of processing and the legal basis for each purpose. This section provides a general overview but lacks specific details about the purposes and legal bases for processing different categories of personal data.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a detailed and granular explanation of each purpose for processing personal data (e.g., providing customer support, improving services, marketing). Clearly identify the legal basis for each purpose, such as consent, contract performance, legal obligation, or legitimate interest.  If relying on legitimate interest, conduct and document a legitimate interest assessment.

non_compliant.section: 在某些國家，為了避免不當地蒐集及使用未成年人的個人資料，我們可能需請您額外提供您的年齡或您父母親（或監護人）的聯絡資料以取得其同意
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services:  For children below the age of 16, parental consent is required for offering information society services directly to a child.  The controller shall make reasonable efforts to verify in such cases that consent is given or authorised by the holder of parental responsibility over the child.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the age of consent for children to provide personal data, taking into account the age defined by GDPR (16 years old) or the age defined by local law if lower.  Clearly outline the process for obtaining parental consent for users below this age, including how consent will be verified.

non_compliant.section: 當您使用華碩產品及服務時，您不一定要依照我們的要求提供個人資料，但如果您選擇不提供，會導致我們在許多情況下無法為您提供產品或服務，或是無法回應您提出的問題
non_compliant.legal provisions: The data subject should have the right to withdraw his or her consent at any time.  It should be as easy to withdraw as to give consent.  When the processing is based on consent or on a contract, and the processing is carried out by automated means, the data subject should have the right to data portability.
non_compliant.amend: Ensure that the request for personal data is not a precondition for providing the service, unless it is necessary for the performance of a contract or required by law.  If the processing is based on consent, provide alternative options for accessing the service without requiring consent.

non_compliant.section: 另外，當您向我們尋求客戶支援服務(如：產品維修)時，除了前述資料，我們可能需請您額外提供您的產品的識別資料（如：產品序號、IMEI碼）。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation, lawfulness of processing
non_compliant.amend: Specify the specific and legitimate purposes for collecting product identification data for customer support, ensuring they are limited to what is necessary. Provide a legal basis for processing this data, such as consent or legitimate interest, and ensure it's separate from any other processing purposes.

non_compliant.section: 當您參加我們舉辦的行銷活動或有獎競賽時，依照不同類型的行銷活動，您可能需要提供您的姓名、電話號碼、電子郵件地址、出生日期、性別、產品的識別資料（如產品序號、IMEI碼）、發票影本(在某些國家的發票內容中，可能會包含您的姓名、地址等個人資料)等個人資料。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation, lawfulness of processing
non_compliant.amend: Clearly specify the purposes for collecting each data element for marketing and contests. Obtain explicit consent for processing sensitive data like birth date and gender. Ensure data collection is limited to what's necessary for each specific marketing activity.

non_compliant.section: 若您是有獎競賽的得獎者或是為了領取贈品，您可能需要額外提供您的郵寄地址(包含郵遞區號)及稅賦申報所必要的資訊（如戶籍地址、身分證/護照的號碼及影本）等。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data collection must be limited to what is necessary for the specified, explicit, and legitimate purpose. Collecting sensitive data like ID/passport copies is excessive for prize delivery.
non_compliant.amend: Limit data collection to name, shipping address, and contact information necessary for prize delivery. Clearly state the purpose and legal basis for data collection.

non_compliant.section: 此外，若我們將透過前述的行銷活動提供您產品回饋金，除了您在前述參加行銷活動或有獎競賽時所提供的個人資料，我們可能需請您額外提供您的匯款資訊。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data collection must be limited to what is necessary for the specified purpose. Requesting additional banking information for cashback rewards may be excessive.
non_compliant.amend: Explore alternative methods for cashback disbursement that minimize data collection. If additional information is necessary, clearly state the purpose and legal basis for collecting it.

non_compliant.section: 當您使用華碩產品時，我們可能會蒐集與您的產品相關連的產品識別資料，例如您的產品序號、網際網路協定位址(IP Address)、MAC Address、IMEI碼、Android ID碼等。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Collecting and processing unique device identifiers like IP addresses, MAC addresses, IMEI, and Android ID can be considered personal data and requires a lawful basis. Legitimate interest may not be sufficient justification.
non_compliant.amend: Provide users with clear information about the specific identifiers collected, the purpose of collection, and the legal basis. Consider anonymization or pseudonymization techniques where possible.

non_compliant.section: 當您使用華碩產品及服務時，我們可能會蒐集與您的產品及服務相關連的位置資料，例如您的產品的GPS、WiFi的訊號、GPS定位位置、WiFi存取位置、基地台的序號、您的產品所在的國家、城市、時區、經緯度、高度、定位的精確度、您在行進時的產品移動速度、您使用產品及服務時所選擇的國家與語言等。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Collecting and processing precise location data requires a lawful basis and must be limited to what is necessary. Continuous and detailed location tracking may be excessive.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly inform users about the types of location data collected, the purpose, and the legal basis. Offer granular control over location sharing, allowing users to opt-in or opt-out of specific location features.

non_compliant.section: 在您使用我們有關健康與健身紀錄的部份產品及服務時，協助您記錄、追蹤、編輯、儲存包括您的身體質量資料、每日活動狀況及依照以上資料所計算出關於您的活動狀況報告等的數據資料。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data, such as health data, requires explicit consent.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify that explicit consent will be obtained before processing health data.

non_compliant.section: 當您聯繫華碩或親臨華碩的維修據點或辦公大樓時，我們所蒐集的您的個人資料及錄音/錄影/對話紀錄資料是為了對您提供支援服務(如：維修服務、回覆您的詢問與查詢)、提供客戶關懷、滿意度調查、獲取意見回饋、維護您的權益和保障人員進出的安全。
non_compliant.article numbers: Article 5(1)(c): Data minimization, Article 5(1)(e): Storage limitation
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data collection must be limited to what is necessary and stored only as long as necessary.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the types of personal data collected for each purpose and the retention period for each data type.

non_compliant.section: 此外，當您使用我們有關機器人的部份服務或產品時，我們所蒐集的您的錄音/錄影是為了讓您的產品得依照需求抵達期望位置。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data processing must be lawful, fair, and transparent.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a more detailed explanation of why recording is necessary for this purpose and how it complies with data minimization principles.

non_compliant.section: 個人化行銷，如透過第三方的廣告性Cookies，提供符合您個人偏好的行銷與廣告內容、根據您過往使用華碩產品及服務的模式來推薦適合您的服務內容。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent for cookies and similar technologies must be freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a clear and separate mechanism for users to consent to cookies, including the option to refuse non-essential cookies.

non_compliant.section: 任何其他取得您同意的目的。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be specific and informed, not a blanket statement.
non_compliant.amend: Replace this vague statement with specific purposes for which consent will be obtained.

non_compliant.section: 此外，當以下匿名資料與上述的個人資料產生連結時，我們亦會將以下匿名資料一併視為您的個人資料並進行適當地保護：
non_compliant.legal provisions: Definition of Personal Data
non_compliant.amend: Clarify that if data is truly anonymised, meaning it can no longer be linked to an individual, then it is no longer considered personal data under GDPR.

non_compliant.section:
4.跨境傳輸
此段介紹華碩在符合各國個人資料相關法規的情形下，將可能會把您的個人資料傳輸至您所在國家以外的地區。
您了解並同意當您使用華碩產品或服務或將您的個人資料提供予我們時，您的個人資料皆將可能在我們位處各國的關係企業、服務供應商間進行跨境傳輸、儲存及處理利用。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transfer Impact Assessment, appropriate safeguards for international transfers (e.g., adequacy decision, SCCs, BCRs)
non_compliant.amend: This section needs to specify the legal basis for transferring data outside of the EEA.  It should mention the use of appropriate safeguards such as adequacy decisions, Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs), Binding Corporate Rules (BCRs), or other legal mechanisms to ensure GDPR-compliant data transfers.

non_compliant.section: 5.1 我們使用Cookies的方式：
non_compliant.legal provisions: GDPR Article 7: Conditions for consent
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly state that users have the right to withdraw consent at any time. It should also specify how users can withdraw consent, such as through browser settings or a dedicated cookie management tool.

non_compliant.section: 儲存您在使用華碩產品及服務所提供的資訊 本類型的Cookies可將您在華碩產品及服務中所填寫的資訊暫時儲存在您的產品中，例如您在ASUS Store購買產品時所填寫的購買資訊，以便記取您欲購買的產品、數量以及您所填寫的資訊，例如ASUS的count cookie。
non_compliant.legal provisions: While storing purchase information is necessary for order processing, the policy lacks clarity on the specific data stored and the duration. It should explicitly state what information is collected, why it's needed, how long it's kept, and how users can access and delete it.
non_compliant.amend: Clearly specify the types of purchase information stored, the purpose and legal basis for processing (e.g., contract performance), data retention period, and user rights regarding this data.

non_compliant.section: 安全性 本類型的Cookies可防止網站詐騙行為，保障您在使用華碩產品及服務時的交易安全，例如ASUS的ip_address cookie。為了以上的目的，我們可能會透過此類Cookies將您在登入ASUS Store和您在ASUS Store下訂單時的IP位址分享給華碩，以讓華碩能夠驗證登入ASUS Store的使用者和在ASUS Store下訂單者為同一人。
non_compliant.legal provisions: While fraud prevention is a legitimate interest, collecting and sharing IP addresses requires a strong legal basis and transparency. The policy should specify the legal basis for processing IP addresses, the recipients of this data (ASUS), and data retention period. It should also inform users about their rights regarding this data processing.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a clear legal basis for processing IP addresses (e.g., legitimate interest for fraud prevention). Specify the data retention period for IP addresses.  Disclose that IP addresses are shared with ASUS and explain the purpose. Inform users about their rights regarding their IP address processing.

non_compliant.section: 本類型Cookies所蒐集得之資訊僅供我們及我們的廣告活動服務供應商使用。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data - Purpose Limitation
non_compliant.amend: Specify the exact purposes for which the data collected through cookies will be used by both the company and its advertising service providers. This should go beyond the broad term "advertising activities" and detail the specific processing activities involved.

non_compliant.section: 如您選擇將Cookies設定為拒絕使用，則我們有可能無法提供您華碩產品及服務完整的功能。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions for consent, Right to object
non_compliant.amend: The user's experience should not be significantly degraded or restricted for refusing cookies. Ensure that essential functionalities of the website and services remain accessible even when cookies are rejected. If certain features are strictly dependent on cookies, offer alternative ways to access those features without compromising user experience.

non_compliant.section:
以下舉出幾個目前市面上常見的瀏覽器類型，您可參考以下連結，來了解如何透過這些瀏覽器管理Cookies設定(以下網站連結的內容為中文，請點選這些網頁中的語言選項，以選擇您方便閱讀的語言)。若您非使用以下瀏覽器，或以下的網址內容被移除，請造訪您的產品所安裝瀏覽器的支援頁面或瀏覽器廠商的隱私權說明頁面以取得更多的資訊。您亦可參考https://www.aboutcookies.org/ 網站(內容為英文)，裡面介紹了如何從許多不同的瀏覽器中管理Cookies設定。

在Google Chrome瀏覽器中清除、啟用與管理 Cookie：
https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647?hl=en
在Microsoft Internet Explorer瀏覽器中清除、啟用與管理 Cookie：
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/278835/how-to-delete-cookie-files-in-internet-explorer
在Mozilla Firefox瀏覽器中清除、啟用與管理 Cookie：
https://support.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparency, Information to be provided
non_compliant.amend:
This section, while providing helpful information, doesn't directly explain how the user's data is collected, used, or processed through cookies. It should be amended to include: 

* **What are cookies?** A clear and concise explanation of what cookies are and their purpose.
* **How we use cookies:** Specify the types of cookies used (e.g., essential, performance, functionality, advertising) and their specific purposes. 
* **Third-party cookies:** Disclose if third-party cookies are used and their purpose. Provide information about these third parties, if applicable.
* **Cookie control:** Explain how users can manage or disable cookies through browser settings or other mechanisms. Reference the provided links as examples.

non_compliant.section: 7.3 若您知悉或發現有任何足以損害華碩產品及服務的技術弱點存在，請立即利用以下電子信箱連絡我們: privacy@asus.com
non_compliant.legal provisions: Notification of a personal data breach to the supervisory authority
non_compliant.amend: This section should include information about how ASUS will handle data breaches, including notifying the appropriate supervisory authority within 72 hours of becoming aware of the breach.

non_compliant.section:
8.如何管理您的資料
此段介紹若您對華碩有任何關於您的個人資料的詢問或需求，可登入「ASUS會員中心」或參考您所實際使用的華碩產品及服務的相關功能及說明，或是透過華碩官方網站內的「消費者個人資料申請」介面或Email至privacy@asus.com.與我們聯繫。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Right to object
non_compliant.amend: This section should provide more specific information about how individuals can exercise their data rights, including the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, and objection. It should also clearly state the contact details of ASUS's Data Protection Officer (DPO), if applicable.

non_compliant.section:
12.聯繫我們
若您對本政策有任何意見、問題、看法或疑慮，或是您認為我們有任何不遵守本政策的情形，皆歡迎您隨時與我們聯絡。若您認為我們可能難以處理涉及您個人資料的相關爭議，您亦有權隨時向您所在國家的個人資料主管機關提出申訴。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall take appropriate measures to provide any information referred to in Articles 13 and 14 and any communication under Articles 15 to 22 and 34 relating to processing to the data subject in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language, in particular for any information addressed specifically to a child.
non_compliant.amend: Provide information on how to contact the data protection authority in a clear and separate section.

non_compliant.section: Email: privacy@asus.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Contact information for the data protection officer (DPO) is required.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a complete and valid email address for the DPO or a dedicated channel for data protection inquiries.
